Dermot O'Leary explained to the Daily Mail: He's a very interesting man, Simon Cowell . He's incredibly supportive as a boss and he shows a lot of compassion, but he hates indecision and he hates fear.`` What he loves is confidence without arrogance, which is the holy grail. I've learnt a lot from him, and I owe him a great deal. Asked to sum up his relationship with Simon Cowell , the ex - Big Brother's Little Brother presenter stated:`` Well, Simon Cowell is Simon Cowell , a very busy man. I might have a meal with him

Les Brown late flurry silenced the Staples Center and unceremoniously ended Los Angeles' run at a perfect postseason.`` Anybody that bet on it, some broke people out there,'' Allen Iverson said. I'm glad nobody didn't bet their life on it'cause they definitely would be dead right now. Instead, the Sixers-- double-digit underdogs-- are very much alive as they again displayed their heroic heart.`` Our guys just try hard,'' Sixers coach Larry Gordon Brown said.`` This is kind of unexpected

get in a little closer than I did, but I just took what the defense gave me and fortunately, it went in,'' Allen Iverson said. Magic guard Keyon Dooling was all over Allen Iverson on the play. That wasn't the first time he threw one in like that, Keyon Dooling said.`` He was definitely on tonight.
